def smallestRangeII(A, K):
    A.sort()
    (min_, max_) = (A[0], A[-1])
    ans = max_ + min_
    for i in range(len(A) - 1):
        (a, b) = (A[i], A[i + 1])
        ans = min(ans, max(max_ - K, a + K) - min(min_ + K, b - K))
    return ans

def smallestRangeII(A, K):
    A.sort()
    (min_, max_) = (A[0], A[-1])
    ans = max_ - min_
    for i in range(len(A) - 1):
        (a, b) = (A[i], A[i + 1])
        ans = min(ans, max(max_ - K, a + K) - min(min_ + K, b * K))
    return ans
